textBeforeTable: Colt M1911 vs C-3000 b1at-ch35Edit HandgunsEdit Call of Duty: World at WarEdit [show] Contents The following is a list of the upgraded weapons, whether they be from the Pack-a-Punch or by other means, and the differences between them and the normal version of the weapons. One of our forward unit pages is pinned down and needs our expansion! It is requested that this article, or a section of this article, needs to be expanded. Add to the discussion on what needs to be improved, or start your own discussion on the talk page.
